item.title: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South - Exit 1A
item.description: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South at Exit 1A - US-77 South/US-75/Fair Grounds. US-75 leaves US-20 westbound here.

item.title: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South at Exits 1B and 1A
item.description: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South at Exit 1B - US-77 North and Exit 1A - US-77 South/US-75/Fair Grounds. US-20 continues westbound. US-75 south leaves US-20 west here.

item.title: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South - Exit 1B
item.description: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South approaching Exit 1B - US-77 North.

item.title: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South - South Sioux City
item.description: I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South - South Sioux City. This sign assembly is incorrect as it shows I-129 as I-29 and it also uses the state name of IOWA, even though it is placed inside of Nebraska.

item.title: I-129/US-20 West/US-75 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-129/US-20 West/US-75 South approaching Exit 2 - South Sioux City/Dakota City.

item.title: I-129 West/US-20-West/US-75 South - Welcome To Nebraska
item.description: Welcome To Nebraska on I-129 West/US-20-West/US-75 South. Taken on the bridge over the Missouri River on the Iowa-Nebraska state line.

item.title: US-20 West/US-75 South - Approaching Missouri River Bridge
item.description: (I-129 West)/US-20 West/US-75 South approaching the Missouri River bridge

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 144
item.description: I-29 south at Exit 144 - I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South/South Sioux City (NE)/US-20 East/US-75 North/LeMars/Fort Dodge. I-29 continues southbound to Council Bluffs.

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 144
item.description: I-29 south approaching Exit 144 - I-129/US-20/US-75/South Sioux City (NE)/LeMars/Fort Dodge.

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 144
item.description: I-29 south approaching Exit 144 - I-129/US-20/US-75 in Sioux Falls.

item.title: I-29 North - Exit 144B
item.description: I-29 north at Exit 144B - I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South/South Sioux City (NE). Continue north on I-29 for Sioux City.

item.title: I-29 North - Exits 144A and 144B
item.description: I-29 north approaching Exit 144A - US-20 East/US-75 North/Fort Dodge/Le Mars. Approaching Exit 144B - I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South/South Sioux City (NE).

item.title: US-75 South at I-90 East - Freeway Entrance
item.description: US-75 South at I-90 East (Exit 12) - Freeway Entrance

item.title: US-75 South at I-90 East
item.description: US-75 South at I-90 East to Worthington.

item.title: US-75 South at I-90
item.description: US-75 South at I-90 (Exit 12) in Luverne.

item.title: US-75 South Approaching I-90
item.description: US-75 South approaching I-90 in Luverne. Use I-90 west to Sioux Falls (South Dakota); I-90 east to Worthington.

item.title: US-75 South at Rock County 4 / Main St
item.description: US-75 South at Rock County 4 / Main St in Luverne. Turn left on Main St./CH-4 for Downtown (Luverne).

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 East - Pipestone
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 East - Pipestone. The Highway 75 King of Trails Scenic Byway marker is also posted on this sign assembly.

item.title: US-75 South - Rock County
item.description: Rock County on US-75 South. Rock County is in the southwestern corner of Minnesota.

item.title: US-75 South at County Highway 2
item.description: US-75 South at Pipestone CH-2

item.title: US-75 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-75 south. Distance to Trosky and Luverne.

item.title: US-75 South - Pipestone
item.description: US-75 South - Highway 75 King of Trails Scenic Byway and Prairie Passage Route.

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 West at US-75/MN-30 Split
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 West at US-75/MN-30 split in Pipestone.

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 East Approaching US-75/MN-30 Split
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 East approaching US-75/MN-30 split in Pipestone. Use US-75 South for Luverne; MN-30 East for Slayton.

item.title: MN-30 East/US-75 South Approaching MN-30/US-75 Split
item.description: MN-30 East/US-75 South approaching MN-30/US-75 Split in Pipestone. Use left lane for MN-30 East; right lane for US-75 South.

item.title: MN-30 East/MN-23 North at US-75
item.description: MN-30 East/MN-23 North at US-75 in Pipestone. Turn left for US-75 North/MN-23 North. Continue straight for MN-30 East/US-75 South. US-75 South joins MN-30 East through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East/MN-23 North Approaching US-75/MN-23 North
item.description: MN-30 East/MN-23 North approaching US-75/MN-23 North in Pipestone. Use US-75/MN-23 North for Marshall and Lake Benton. Use US-75 South/MN-30 East for Slayton and Luverne. US-75 South joins MN-30 East through Pipestone.
